attributes.action: stop people creating stupid petitions on this website (for example, make Jeremy Clarkson PM)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's a bit ridiculous. This site is a good idea to make it easier to influence government policy. However, as it is the internet some people are just messing about. Don't. Oh and I'm fully aware this is a "stupid petition" but at least it's a reasonable one.

rejection.details: Comments on the petitions system should be sent to webmaster@pmo.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
